title: contact group error
body:
when trying to setup a group for a contact the group entries making problems.

when a group is selected and saved, for next user for which a group will be assigned is not showing anymore the whole group list, only few entries left.

when deleting the group for previous user, the whole list appears again when doing rescan

sometimes when doing rescan follwing error appears:
fehler beim setzen der prã¼fsumme. (error setting checksum)
log in owncloud.log:
{"app":"contacts","message":"oc_contacts_app::oc_contacts_app::scancategories, scanning: 10 starting from 0","level":0,"time":1361379958}
{"app":"core","message":"oc_vcategories::save: array\n(\n)\n","level":0,"time":1361379958}
{"app":"contacts","message":"oc_contacts_app::oc_contacts_app::scancategories, scanning: 10 starting from 0","level":0,"time":1361379958}
{"app":"core","message":"oc_vcategories::save: array\n(\n)\n","level":0,"time":1361379958}


envrionment:
owncloud 4.5.7
apache 2
mysql 5
php5
ubuntu 12
